name: synchronize_story_examples
description: Synchronize story graph examples with rendered story documents
output: Sync report and updated files if discrepancies found
process: Load story graph from project area
For each story, load corresponding document
Extract scenario outlines and examples from document
Compare with scenario outlines and examples in graph
Validate Examples table quality (all variables, concrete data, etc.)
If discrepancies found, ask user for resolution strategy
Save updated files to project area
